query:
query getProduct($productId: Int, $subCategoryId: Int!, $city: String!, $productName: String, $selectedFields: [FieldRequest], $catalogProfileType: CatalogProfileType, $cancelledSuborder: Boolean) {
  getProduct(productId: $productId, subCategoryId: $subCategoryId, city: $city, selectedFields: $selectedFields, fullCatalogScope: true, productName: $productName, filterOnHoldItems: true, catalogProfileType: $catalogProfileType, cancelledSuborder: $cancelledSuborder) {
    name
    baseSkuId
    basePrice
    name
    baseImage
    productId
    skuList {
      hlSkuId
      skuId
      quantity
      showQuantity
      fieldData {
        fieldName
        fieldValue
        __typename
      }
      customField {
        wallCladding {
          servingArea
          panelPerBox
          panelDimension
          wastagePercentage
          snappingWidth
          panelSplit
          panelOrientation
          backPanel
          mirrorPanel
          panelApplication
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      mrp
      sellingPrice
      sellingUom
      imageList
      skuStatus
      assetStatus
      assetDimension
      installationSku {
        hlSkuId
        basePrice
        __typename
      }
      moq
      categoryMov
      productName
      __typename
    }
    configurableAttribute {
      attributeName
      options {
        label
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
